MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY10 postcode area of Aloa, affecting properties in Newtonshaw and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1pm for safety due to an underground cable fault  and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:29pm on Friday, 29 January 2021
